body: I have to say, I really like this douijin saga, mainly because it was more grounded. Like many other ntr stories all of this shit happened because of miscommunication from both parts. And as shitty as it seems this is closer to reality. The wife is in the wrong all way through because she could tell her husband “I am horny let’s fuck”, the husband is only guilty of not telling his wife that he is infertile. All in all, the end was good in my opinion: The husband gets furious and choke her (which is not ok) they speak and acknowledge both their errors and they move on with their respective lives like normal human beings.

I only tell you this, probably artist is a female. Because there's a fatal flaw in story i consistently observed in females. Self justifying cheating. You could say lack of communication coused this but the guy just felt insecure about his problem, the woman however took it on another level. Not tried to communicate nor attempt to divorce for clean cut. Justified her behaviour in her mind, applied victim card on herself and her actions and goes along with it. To me it's pretty retarded, not once she attempted to make a clean cut. There's a huge problem with her personality. Compared to insecure guy. If you check similar cases you would definetly know females generally act like this. The though play is like i want both way while maintaining balance. There's no such thing as eating a cake while still having it.
I really like the third guy.

The story is well written to accurately describe the dilemma of dealing with uncovered cheating, BUT I don't find it totally realistic. A 50/50. Its characters cannot be said to be realistic: A pathetic MC who hasn't had sex for 4 years is possible but not an everyday thing (realistic), a woman who is unfaithful to her husband with guys who have nothing in common (not even the physical nor in the personality) seems to me completely fictitious. It's just a way the author wants the reader to identify with these stereotypes. I repeat, the story reflects well the problem of a couple facing infidelity, but the reason and the development of this infidelity is fiction.
Disagree with the cheating but I can't deny this was surprisingly well written for a hentai story.
I hope you suffer from ED and Infertility and get cheated on while you suffer quietly without telling her that you suffer from said diseases. Have a good day vanillatard.
Cheating does not justify her payback for his lack of communication. A simple talk, could have settle this.

heartbreaking ending but the best ending. Both parties at fault, communication is key.

I never expected a novel here.   An ending should be meaningful, but that doesnt mean it should be happy or good. What we agree on is our own preferences, and understanding the ending means understanding the story. I feel like this is a very good one, as it gives insight of what could be considered reality. It is not totally fictional in a sense that it can happen irl

She even decodes to pay compensation to her ex for ruining the marriage.  Yeah, hubby lied but she actually committed adultery.  They meet up for her to give him the last compensation payment.  He wants to go out with her but she shoots him down.  Next it seems like she's on the phone with someone maybe?  She's probably still fucking old guy as a mistress now.  Then the end is where she deletes exes contact info from phone and sheds some tears.  Maybe she still loves him or hates herself.  Who knows.

@winterknightX. Guy tells cheating wife that he was infertile and couldn't have kids so he stopped having sex with her so she wouldnt' find out. After that, they divorced and she moved out. They met so she could pay off the alimony from her cheating & they separate. She deletes the ex-husbands contact afterwards & the 2 don't meet again. 

Pretty amicable split given the circumstances.
